ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour   question
ygData.msgSnippet: Cazic Thule/Veeshan/Rallos Zek are the 3 most porpular servers, when the fish did Fenin Fo get there? I m warning you, get over to Innoruuk or you r dead meat.
ygData.messageBody:
Cazic Thule/Veeshan/Rallos Zek are the 3 most porpular servers, when the fish
did Fenin Fo get there?

I'm warning you, get over to Innoruuk or you'r dead meat. Besides, in those
servers, most of the people are ABOVE level 20, so the level 1-20 area are VERY
dry. Prexus would be a good place to be if you want more people to be with you

Level 8 is a low level, if I can give up a level 36 enchanter, I can't see why
you can't give up a level 8 warrior

As a conculsion, get to Innoruuk in A WEEK or you MUST send us YOUR ADDRESS.
Prepare for a surprise.

Yap Sieh Roy wrote:

> From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
>
> aiya..
>
> more pple more shiok mah!!
> fennin and veeshan always got close to 1000 players online ..
> innoruk got around 600 only ??
>
> roy
>
> ----- Original Message -----

> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
> question
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Err Fennin Ro server? Come to Innoruuk lah. Our parang chopper got lvl
> 35
> > enchanter elsewhere also LPPL start a new one in Innoruuk. U wanna kena
> > chopped issit? ;)
> >
> > Now most impt is to get my wiz to lvl 16 and get the invis spell first.
> > W/o it my butt kena kicked until sored. Last night I'm hunting derv
> > alone, sharing kills with another 2 group of lvl 10-12 players. Seem like
> > good xp there, but down time kinda long coz I used up at least 80% of my
> > mana for every kill ;( Other groups kill 2 b4 I can kill 1, sigh.
> >
> > Ziltus
> >

> > [SMTP:sryap@...] wrote:
> > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>

> > > >
> > > > Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
> > > >
> > > > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > hi,
> > > > >
> > > > > been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of
> > > questions
> > > > > abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> > > > >
> > > > > ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> > > > > medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> > > > > hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> > > > >
> > > > > the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book. there
> is
> > > only 2
> > > > > slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what about
> > > studded
> > > > > and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence of
> > > making
> > > > > them ?
> > > > >
> > > > > thanks !
> > > > > roy
